description: Huerto Manías is an initiative born from the need to support individuals with serious mental illnesses, providing them with opportunities for work and personal growth. Established in 2014 in Ecuador, it focuses on agricultural activities and the production of value-added products, fostering a sense of community and mental well-being. The organization emphasizes the importance of human connection and training, aiming to empower its members while addressing the stigma surrounding mental health issues.
name: Huerto Manías
